{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3582300,"name":"","username":"eyeon180","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/e/898d66/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-04-07T12:59:27.711Z","cooked":"

Hello! I am currently in the process of developing a series of multimedia educational guides (videos, written explanations, code examples, etc.) meant to be used by new programmers within FRC, especially by those belonging to new teams without access to mentors experienced with WPILib.
How Can You Help?
If you would like to help, I would request that you simply fill out the survey linked here. It asks several questions regarding what concepts you feel are important for new programmers to understand regarding FRC Programming and WPILib. All questions are optional, so you may answer as many or as few as you like. Additionally, should you so choose, you may be credited for your assistance, as it would be greatly appreciated.

Help Create Educational Guides for FRC Programming1429×2000 250 KB
